name: objectInsideGeofence

metadata.description:
objectInsideGeofence Sensor


Check if a coordinates are inside of a geofenced area.

States State is IN if the provided coordinates are iside any of the provided geofences.
  • IN
  • OUT

Raw data
  • device: coordinates of the device
  • result: IN or OUT for each coordinate pair

Properties
  • geofences: list of geofences:e.g. 
            [
            {
                "id": "Antwerp",
                "type": "circle",
                "radius": 10000,
                "coordinates": { "latitude": 51.21989, "longitude": 4.4025 }
            },
            {
                "id": "Ghent",
                "type": "polygon",
                "coordinates": [
                    { "latitude": 51.089091, "longitude": 3.606198 },
                    { "latitude": 51.110157, "longitude": 3.869108 }, 
                    { "latitude": 50.995344, "longitude": 3.878717 },
                    { "latitude": 50.995685, "longitude": 3.628888 }
                ]
            }
            
        ]
  • coordinates: e.g. 
            {
            "latitude": 51.2194,
            "longitude": 4.4025
        }
